snippet: Lt. Gov. Timothy Murray was driving at more than 100 miles per hour and showed behavior consistent with falling asleep at the wheel when his car flipped over early on Nov. 2.
abstract: Massachusetts State Police say Lt Gov Timothy Murray was driving at more than 100 miles per hour and showed behavior consistent with falling asleep at the wheel when his car flipped over in Nov 2011.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Gov. Timothy Murray was driving at more than 100 miles per hour and showed behavior consistent with falling asleep at the wheel when his car flipped over early on Nov. 2.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Police Say Lieutenant Governor Was Sleeping and Speeding Before Car Crash
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Police Say Lieutenant Governor Was Sleeping and Speeding Before Car Crash
